${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.

If you need to use it for stuff.

${modID}:HiredGun.NAME: Hired Gun
${modID}:HiredGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hermit:Dead_On: If played by a class other than a Hermit, gain 1 hermit:Rugged. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HiredGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hermit:Dead_On: If played by a class other than a Hermit, gain 1 hermit:Rugged.

${modID}:Diversion.NAME: Diversion
${modID}:Diversion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply 2 tiscardpack:Taunt to an enemy. NL ALL allies draw !M! card and hermit:Concentrate. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Diversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply 2 tiscardpack:Taunt to an enemy. NL ALL allies draw !M! cards and hermit:Concentrate. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HeistPlan.NAME: Heist Plan
${modID}:HeistPlan.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Diversion into the draw pile of all players in the room. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HeistPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Diversion into the draw pile of all players in the room. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DealersChoice.NAME: Dealer's Choice
${modID}:DealersChoice.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies draw X cards. NL hermit:Dead_On: ALL allies gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DealersChoice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL allies draw X+1 cards. NL hermit:Dead_On: ALL allies gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Scapegoat.NAME: Scapegoat
${modID}:Scapegoat.DESCRIPTION: tiscardpack:Transfer a random Curse from each ally's draw pile into your hand. Gain 1 hermit:Rugged for each Curse received. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Scapegoat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL tiscardpack:Transfer a random Curse from each ally's draw pile into your hand. Gain 1 hermit:Rugged for each Curse received. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Shootout.NAME: Shootout
${modID}:Shootout.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Greedy. NL All Strikes and Defends allies play this turn tiscardpack:Transfer to you. They cost 0 for you this turn.
${modID}:Shootout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Greedy. NL All Strikes and Defends allies play this turn tiscardpack:Transfer to you and Upgrade. They cost 0 for you this turn.

${modID}:Barfight.NAME: Barfight
${modID}:Barfight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hermit:Bruise to ALL enemies and players in the room.
${modID}:Barfight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! hermit:Bruise to ALL enemies. NL Apply 3 hermit:Bruise to ALL players in the room.

${modID}:FrontierJustice.NAME: Frontier Justice
${modID}:FrontierJustice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, apply 1 Artifact to a random ally.
${modID}:FrontierJustice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a debuff is applied to you, apply 1 Artifact to a random ally.

${modID}:DesertRain.NAME: Desert Rain
${modID}:DesertRain.DESCRIPTION: ALL players heal HP equal to !M! times the number of Curses in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HoldEm.NAME: Hold 'Em
${modID}:HoldEm.DESCRIPTION: ALL players in the room lose 1 Dexterity and gain !M! ${modID}:Plated_Armor. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FalseGrit.NAME: False Grit
${modID}:FalseGrit.DESCRIPTION: EACH ally gains buffs based on their debuffs: NL !M! Strength if Weak. NL !M! Dexterity if Frail. NL 1 hermit:Rugged if Vulnerable.

${modID}:UglyBusiness.NAME: Ugly Business
${modID}:UglyBusiness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !M! Frail to a random ally.

${modID}:NewSheriff.NAME: New Sheriff
${modID}:NewSheriff.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tiscardpack:Taunt to an enemy until next turn. NL hermit:Dead_On: Gain 1 hermit:Rugged. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlackSand.NAME: Black Sand
${modID}:BlackSand.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL allies gain Block equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BlackSand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL players in the room gain Block equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
